entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 1:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
